activities.name: Execute EDW_Discovery to EDW_Mart Data Copy

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT t.TargetBlobFilePath
            ,t.TargetBlobFileName + '-' + cast(convert(date,[dbo].[udf_getLocalDTM](),121) as  
 varchar(10)) +  t.targetBlobFileNameExt AS targetBlobFileName
            ,t.TargetBlobContainer
            ,t.ColumnDelimiter
            ,t.QuoteCharacter
FROM ETL.SourceSystem S  
Inner join ETL.SourceTableDetails T
 ON S.SourceID = T.SourceID
WHERE S.SourceName =  '@{pipeline().parameters.sourcename}'
and lower(SourceTableName)='geospatial_devices'

properties.description: Every Thursday loading Chris21 Payroll files.
